item.description:
Learn which personality types might work better for you! See Herb's workshops also at his Enneagram Meetup Group.

Learn the Basics of the Enneagram. Herb acts out the 9 personality types with hats and props and helps you find your core type. He points out growth and relationship tips for each type present. You'll have lots of fun and insights and learn about important people in your present and past and how to communicate with them more effectively.

With close to 20 years of experience teaching close to 2000 Enneagram workshops and trainings publicly and in organizations, you'll be in good hands. Herb is a psychotherapist/coach for individuals, couples and families and Herb also uses the Enneagram with companies for team building and sales training

7-10pm, fine to pay at door, cash or check, $20. Sliding scale if cost prevents you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40 so if you can afford more than $20, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Best directions are on my website, www.herbpearce.com.

Bring vegetarian refreshments and drinks if you like.

Herb Pearce
781 648 3737
herb@herbpearce.com
www.herbpearce.com
Check out my other meetup group
www.meetup.com/Enneagram-Group
item.name: Enneagram Personality Types Workshop
